events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position. The resume highlights strong experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering based on keywords such as 'software engineer,' 'developer,' and experience with cloud infrastructure.
The recruiting team has assigned a recruiter to this candidate to coordinate the next steps in the hiring process for the software engineer role.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call, confirming the candidate's technical skills and interest in the software engineering role at our company.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm and confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for the candidate, allowing assessment of coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in algorithms, system design, and cloud infrastructure.
An HR interview has been scheduled with the candidate to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies before moving forward.
The HR interview was completed successfully with positive feedback regarding the candidateâ€™s communication skills and alignment with company values.
An official offer for the software engineer position was proposed to the candidate, outlining salary, start date, and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer for the software engineer role, confirming their commitment to join the company.
The onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions, setup of development environment, and introduction to team members.
The hiring process has been successfully closed. The new software engineer is now officially part of the engineering team.
